title: Giniro no Kami no Agito (Origin: Spirits of the Past)
synopsis: Three hundred years ago, a genetic experiment gone wrong caused the mutation of all forests on Earth. Armed with consciousness, the vegetation sought to destroy all of humankind, and the war that ensued turned the planet into a hellish dystopia.
voices: ['Katsuji, Ryou', 'Miyazaki, Aoi', 'Endou, Kenichi', 'Fukawa, Toshikazu', 'Oosugi, Ren', 'Minami, Omi', 'Hamaguchi, Masaru', 'Kotegawa, Yuuko', 'Houki, Katsuhisa', 'Koyama, Takehiro']
staff: [['Sugiyama, Keiichi', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Wakabayashi, Kazuhiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Shimizu, Kenichi', ['Episode Director']], ['Suzuki, Kaoru', ['Episode Director']]]
